meanings.definition: To make complex or more complex.
meanings.sent1: She complexifies the math problem by adding more numbers.
meanings.sent2: The new software update complexifies the user interface.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to cook a simple meal somehow complexifies into a culinary disaster.
meanings.sent4: The artist's use of vibrant colors complexifies the painting, making it truly captivating.
meanings.sent5: The intricate plot of the mystery novel complexifies the reader's experience, keeping them engaged until the very end.
